title: Launcher
body:
English 

Hello I speak french but i will try to translate this for got more help :

I have reboot my computer 1 week ago and i have download LeagueOfLegends but I got a probleme becvause noww i have the last launcher ( S6 ) and I don't find how to take Launcher S7

PS : On S6 launcher i can't use sandbox mode

Thanks for all and good day / Sorry for my english I do my better ;3 

FR :

Bonjour,

J'ai reboot mon pc il y a une semaine et j'ai donc réinstallé League Of légends malheureusement je me retrouve avec le launcher de la S6 et je ne trouve pas comment récuperer le launcher de la S7

PS : Sur ce launcher je n'est même pas le mode Sandobx :/

Merci d'avance pour votre aide et bonne journée

replies.body:
It sounds like you're looking to upgrade to the *Beta Client*. You should have received a prompt to upgrade, but if not, you can hit the button in your patcher to start the upgrade:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

Let me know if this helped!

Thanks for you help ;p

But i don't follow what did you say ;p

I have open my fill of leagueoflegends and i have launch lol.launcher.admin 

Thanks for all

If you click on the picture I posted, it shows the button in your patcher where you can initiate the client upgrade process. :)

If you need me to clarify further, let me know.
